column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For my main course
column2: I ordered the steak frites (with a side of creamed spinach
column3: my favorite steakhouse staple).  After what was another eternity (it took 2.5 hours for us to be served and eat 2 courses)
column4: our food finally arrived. I had asked for my steak to be prepared medium-rare
column5: although it was probably closer to medium.  The steak itself was an okay cut
column6: still tender given that it was cooked more than I would have liked
column7: but it was just that: fine and average.
